description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Can you survive 32 deadly diamond mines? Featuring anti-gravity, 4D teleport, forcefields, bubbles, elixirs, jumping jelly beans and much much more, Earth Shaker is a remake of a classic ZX Spectrum puzzle game. Written in 1990 by Michael Batty, this version includes the original graphics and sound, as well as an all new replay feature and level designer.
